pr_title: Changed the AdminClientProvider to use keystore and password in theSecrets

timeline.message:
Changed the AdminClientProvider to use keystore and password in the
Secrets instead of recreating it
Making AdminClientProvider generic for being used not only by CO but
even UO, TO

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

Moved AdminClientProvider and default implementation in operator common
package

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can we javadoc it, now that it's going to be used in more places?
timeline.author: tombentley

timeline.bodyText: KIP-476 added a superinterface called Admin for the AdminClient class, so I think we should make this interface return an Admin.
timeline.author: tombentley

timeline.message:
Used Admin interface as per KIP-476

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

Replaced a few missing Admin interface

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>
